com.telesign.phoneid

Class PhoneId

  • Object
    • com.telesign.phoneid.PhoneId

  • public class PhoneId
extends Object
    The PhoneId class abstracts your interactions with the TeleSign PhoneID web service. A PhoneId object encapsulates your credentials (your TeleSign Customer ID and Secret Key).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String customer_id 
      private String secret_key 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhoneId(String customer_id, String secret_key)
      The PhoneId class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PhoneIdContactResponse contact(String identifier, String ucid)
      Returns contact details for a specified phone number’s subscriber.
      PhoneIdLiveResponse live(String identifier, String ucid)
      Returns information about a specified phone number’s state of operation.
      PhoneIdScoreResponse score(String identifier, String ucid)
      Returns risk information about a specified phone number, including a real-time risk score, threat level, and recommendation for action.
      PhoneIdStandardResponse standard(String identifier)
      Returns information about a specified phone number’s type, numbering structure, cleansing details, and location details.

    • Field Detail

      • customer_id

        private final String customer_id

      • secret_key

        private final String secret_key

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhoneId

        public PhoneId(String customer_id,
       String secret_key)
        The PhoneId class constructor. Once you instantiate a PhoneId object, you can use it to make instance calls to PhoneID Standard, PhoneID Score, PhoneID Contact, and PhoneID Live.
        Parameters:
        customer_id - [Required] A string representing your TeleSign Customer ID. This represents your TeleSign account number.
        secret_key - [Required] A string representing your TeleSign Secret Key (available from the TeleSign Client Portal).

    • Method Detail

      • contact

        public PhoneIdContactResponse contact(String identifier,
                             String ucid)
        Returns contact details for a specified phone number’s subscriber. This includes the subscriber's First Name, Last Name, Street Address, City, State (or Province), Country, and ZIP (Postal) Code.
        Parameters:
        identifier - [Required] A string representing the phone number you want information about.
        ucid - [Required] A string specifying one of the Use Case Codes.
        Returns:
        A PhoneIdContactResponse object, which contains the JSON-formatted response body from the TeleSign server.

      • live

        public PhoneIdLiveResponse live(String identifier,
                       String ucid)
        Returns information about a specified phone number’s state of operation. You can use it to find out if the line is in service, if the number is reachable, if the mobile phone is roaming, and if so, in which country.
        Parameters:
        identifier - [Required] A string representing the phone number you want information about.
        ucid - [Required] A string specifying one of the Use Case Codes.
        Returns:
        A PhoneIdContactResponse object, which contains the JSON-formatted response body from the TeleSign server.

      • score

        public PhoneIdScoreResponse score(String identifier,
                         String ucid)
        Returns risk information about a specified phone number, including a real-time risk score, threat level, and recommendation for action.
        Parameters:
        identifier - [Required] A string representing the phone number you want information about.
        ucid - [Required] A string specifying one of the Use Case Codes.
        Returns:
        A PhoneIdScoreResponse object, which contains the JSON-formatted response body from the TeleSign server.

      • standard

        public PhoneIdStandardResponse standard(String identifier)
        Returns information about a specified phone number’s type, numbering structure, cleansing details, and location details.
        Parameters:
        identifier - [Required] A string representing the phone number you want information about.
        Returns:
        A PhoneIdStandardResponse object, which contains the JSON-formatted response body from the TeleSign server.
